Description.span:
This component deinterleaves data acquired by the "Biopac MP150/MP160" component. It should be connected to a Biopac MP150/MP160 component or a Player component replaying data recorded from the Biopac MP150/MP160 component.

Data is sent to separated outputs for each channel acquired. If the Biopac MP150/MP160 component emitted multiple samples for every channel at every output emission, the deinterleaver will do the same.

The "Number of channels" property must be configured. Please see below.

Specify the number of outputs to be created (limited to 32: number of channels of the MP150/MP160). It must match the number of channels the input data contains (reported by the MP150/MP160 component's "Number of channels" property), else data can't be properly deinterleaved.

Once validated, outputs will be created as well as new properties where you can optionnally change the name of the outputs.
